name: Magnet Puzzler
description:
Info

Magnet Puzzler is a game about a magnet and a puzzle. It was forged in the depths of Code Ninjas for the specific purpose of creating a game for Black Belt and involves matching four coloured projectiles together to score points.

Why a puzzle game?

You ask me. It's not even my favourite genre. I do really like playing games like Tetris™ when I'm bored though.

Source Code

If you want to download the source code, you can go to the GitHub page here: https://github.com/GraysonV/MagnetPuzzler
